name: Sketch Slider
description:
Created in a 48 hour game jam (and some extra hours for fixes and polishes) by our freshly extended team of 5 Austrian developers, Sketch slider was made with Unity and consists solely of selfmade art, assets, sound effects, music and game code. Desktop version (for true fans <3) can be found below.

Credits:

Savo Vuksan - Project Lead, Programmer
Bozo Vuksan - Lead Designer, 3D Artist
David Eilmsteiner - Programmer, 3D Artist
Maximilian Märkl - Sound effects
Emil Dobetsberger - Programmer, Music
